entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • User Story: .NET developers have a first-class experience for observability using Open Telemetry in their applications #3762
  • User Story: Cloud Native developers have the tools to be able to collect traces and dumps in container environments and perform 1st level analysis on them #3761
  • lldb dumpmt crashes against source-built .NET 7 on Fedora 37 #3757
  • Epic: .NET Developers have a great observability & diagnostics experience for cloud-native applications #3756
    8.0.0
